setup.notification: Daikin Altherma is installed, please open the app settings to configure it.

settings.title: Your Daikin Altherma in Homey with ESPAltherma
settings.intro: To use your Daikin Altherma in Homey with ESPAltherema, Homey must be authenticated at your MQTT broker.

auth.authenticated: The Daikin Altherma App for Homey is successfully authenticated at your MQTT broker.
auth.disconnected: The Daikin Altherma App for Homey is disconnected from your MQTT broker. Please check the MQTT Server and the information and click Connect.
auth.reconnecting: The Daikin Altherma App for Homey is reconnecting to your MQTT broker. Please enter the MQTT Server and the information and click Connect.
auth.notauthenticated: The Daikin Altherma App for Homey is not authenticated at your MQTT broker. Please enter the information and click Connect.

settings.debuginfo: View the log in you browser at: http://[homey-ip-address]:8008
